name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
schedule:

1	Introduction
2     	Interpretation as a Profession
3     	Paraphrasing/Public speaking 
4     	Sight translation I (E-C)
5    	Sight translation II (E-C)
6	Sight translation III (C-E)
7	Sight translation IV (C-E) 
8   	NTUTAPPLINX 2011
9    	Mid-term
10    	Memory retention/Recall exercises I 
11    	Memory retention/Recall exercises II 
12   	Short CI on general topics I
13   	Short CI on general topics II 
14   	Note-taking for CI: Skills and strategies I
15   	Note-taking for CI: Skills and strategies II 
16   	Note-taking for CI: Skills and strategies III*
17   	Wrap-up
18   	Final
	
	*More CI training shall continue in the spring term 2012
scorePolicy:
Assessment:
30% on mid-term examination
30% on final examination
